meanings.sent1: The cystoscopic procedure was painless and quick.
meanings.sent2: The doctor used a cystoscopic tool to examine the bladder.
meanings.sent3: The nurse made a joke about the cystoscopic equipment looking like a tiny telescope.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were as clear and focused as a cystoscopic lens.
meanings.sent5: The cystoscopic examination revealed no abnormalities in the bladder.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the examination of the bladder using a cystoscope.
meanings.sent1: The cystoscopic test provided detailed images of the bladder.
meanings.sent2: Patients may feel some discomfort during a cystoscopic examination.
meanings.sent3: The technician accidentally dropped the cystoscopic device, causing a comical moment in the clinic.
meanings.sent4: His curiosity led him to explore the world with a cystoscopic perspective.
meanings.sent5: The cystoscopic view showed the inner workings of the bladder clearly.
